original: Eriksson, Sven Erik Osborn, kyr-koiherde, Knäred, f. 7/7/99 i Gällstad, Älvsb. 1., av Jo^han E. o. Agda Sved- berg. G. 30 m. Ragnhild Karlsson. Barn: Gunnar f. 31, Bengt o. Anders 34, Ingemar 37. — Stud:ex. i Lund 23, teol. fil. ex. 25, teol. kand. o. prakt, teol. prov 28, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 29. V. pastor i Dalstorp 29, kommin. i Gällstad 30, i Länghem 34, kyrkoh. i Knäred sed. 39.
translated: Eriksson, Sven Erik Osborn, church curate, Knäred, born on July 7, 1899 in Gällstad, Älvsborgs län. Son of Johan E. and Agda Svedberg. Married Ragnhild Karlsson in 1930. Children: Gunnar (born 1931), Bengt and Anders (twins born in 1934), Ingemar (born 1937). He graduated from Lund University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1923, a Bachelor of Theology degree in 1925, and completed his practical theology training in 1928. He was ordained as a priest for the Gothenburg Diocese in 1929. He served as a vicar in Dalstorp in 1929, curate in Gällstad in 1930, curate in Länghem in 1934, and as a vicar in Knäred from 1939 onwards.
